summary: This document appears to be a forwarded email containing a threatening message sent to an FBI agent. The message includes a death threat referencing the recipient's brother and a warning to 'Look behind you.' The communication was sent via a method described as 'tin can and suing' and includes references to FBI personnel in New York.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent
persons.context: The agent appears to be the recipient or subject of a forwarded threatening email. The message is addressed to or concerns this agent.

events.title: Threatening message sent to FBI agent
events.description: An anonymous threat was sent to an FBI agent, stating 'You will diiiie like your brother' and 'Look behind you.'

keyFacts: A death threat was sent to an FBI agent, referencing the agent's brother.
The threat included the phrase 'Look behind you,' suggesting intimidation or warning.
The communication was forwarded within the FBI's New York Division on May 26, 2020.
The threat was sent via a method described as 'tin can and suing,' which may refer to an anonymous or untraceable communication method.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting a possible connection to threats against investigators or witnesses in the Epstein investigation.
